name: teriyaki
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a Japanese dish consisting of meat or fish cooked in a sauce made with soy sauce and other flavourings: You could have chicken teriyaki with rice. They serve the steak pan-fried or grilled, with teriyaki sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesThey're businesses where locals go to get their nails done, or eat teriyaki and chow mein.My kids loved the beef teriyaki.Be careful with teriyaki because the sauce can contain a lot of sugar.I had teriyaki chicken wings.
